venue.name: Sailing Vessel Madeleine - Day sails: Bannister's Wharf

item.description:
Lets enjoy a late Summer Sunset Sail!

Approximately 90 minute sail aboard the 72 foot schooner Madeleine through the Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay. Madeleine is a traditional Bermuda rig schooner specifically designed and built to carry passengers (49) easily and safely through local waters. Coast Guard inspected annually, Madeleine is the perfect choice for a great sailing experience on the bay.

The Sunset Sail includes complimentary champagne and beer. For your convenience, a restroom is available onboard. Keep in mind that weather conditions can change rapidly, and that temperatures are lower on the water than on land. Please dress accordingly. Rain ponchos are available upon requests.

For directions and additonal information visit: http://www.cruisenewport.com/ call 401-847-0298. or
To attend this event, you must purchase tickets (Madeleine Boat Sunset Cruise @ 6:30 - $37) at: https://www.bookonthenet.net/west/XkeyEres/EresMain.aspx?inn_id=1102030001
Please RSVP only after you have purchased your ticket.

After our sail, for those who wish we can head to local resturaunt for dinner, will update with details.

Carpooling suggested, please content members directly or post in comments.

Be sure to leave ample time for your trip down to Newport and for parking so you don't miss the sail! If you need to reach me call 508-415-0590.

This event is for Funseekers members only, and would appreciate that the above not be re-posted onÂ another Meetup groups site. Thanks!
item.name: Sunset Sail
